item.title: Dr Tania Mathias chosen to stand up for local people in Twickenham
item.description: Last night local residents of Twickenham attended an Open Primary and selected local Twickenham councilor Dr Tania Mathias to be their Conservative candidate for the Twickenham Constituency at the General Election in 2015.

item.title: Cabinet Ministers warn of Labour tax bombshell on family holidays
item.description: Labour want new taxes on local hotels and B and Bs say Maria Miller and Eric Pickles

item.title: Results of MEP ballot announced
item.description: Over the last month, Conservative members have been balloted to choose the candidates and their position on the ballot paper for next year’s European Elections.

item.title: Marcus Fysh selected for Yeovil
item.description: Marcus Fysh chosen to stand up for local people in Yeovil

item.title: Clarence Mitchell selected for Brighton Pavilion
item.description: Brighton and Hove Conservatives have selected Clarence Mitchell as their Prospective Parliamentary Candidate for Brighton Pavilion in the 2015 General Election.

item.title: Ann Myatt selected for Westmorland and Lonsdale
item.description: Westmorland and Lonsdale Conservatives have selected Ann Myatt as their Prospective Parliamentary candidate for the 2015 General Election.

item.title: Robert Alden selected for Birmingham Erdington
item.description: Erdington Conservative Association is delighted to announce that popular local resident Cllr Robert Alden has been selected to stand at the next general election.

item.title: Matthew Maxwell Scott selected for Carshalton & Wallington
item.description: Carshalton and Wallington Conservatives have selected Matthew Maxwell Scott as their Prospective Parliamentary Candidate for the 2015 General Election.

item.title: Crime fallen by 10% under this government
item.description: Recorded crime is down by more than ten per cent under this government, and the independent survey shows that the public’s experience of crime is at its lowest level since records began.

item.title: Unemployment down by 57k in last quarter
item.description: Unemployment is down and fewer people are claiming Jobseeker's Allowance than in May 2010
